page.title: 17Public Houses in Kirtlington
page.content: Public Houses in Oxfordshire may have the following opening hours: Monday to 10.30-14.30 and 18.00-23.00 Saturday- Sunday- 12.00-14.30 and 19.00-22.30 The Dashwood Arms sells Tetley Bitter, John Bull Bitter, Pale Ale (Barley Corn) and Skol Lager. They serve bar snacks and full meals. Dominoes, darts, pool and cards provide recreation for customers. Overnight accommodation is available. *** The Oxford Arms sells Harvest Bitter, John Bull Bitter, Double Diamond, Draught Guiness, Pale Ale and Skol Lager. Harvest is a Real Ale. They serve bar snacks and full meals. Children are allowed through the pub on their way to the restaurant. Aunt Sally, pool and darts can be played. * Both pubs have a garden where children are allowed but they must not drink alcohol until 18 years old.
